title: shivakAmEshvarIm
sahitya:
shivakAmEshvarIm cintayEham shrngAra rasa sampUrNa karIm


anupallavi

 shivakAmEshvara maha priyakarIm shivAnanda guruguha vashankarIm


caraNam   shAnta kalyANa guNa shAlinIm shAntya tIta kalA svarUpiNIm mAdhurya gAnAmrta mOdinIm 
madAlasAm hamsOllAsinIm cidambarapurIshvarIm cidagni kuNDa sambhUta sakalEshvarIm
